title: 自己用MCreator做了个mod，然后就崩了
author: youyihj
txt_content:
错误报告
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Shall we play a game?

Time: 16-7-16 下午1:07
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.src.ClientProxyExtraMod

replies.author: wuyu522
replies.txt_content:
UE        ExtraMod{1.0.0} [ExtraMod] (整合包专属mod.zip)    这是你自己制造的mod吧？？
这个mod产生的错误导致游戏崩溃

replies.author: 起床先搭路
replies.txt_content: 这要看你电脑配置，好的话就是你的mod有毒简称卡炸显卡，配置低的话呵呵不说了
